results.title: The old man
results.creator_credit: Koorie Heritage Trust and Lee Stewart
results.brief_description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.
results.description: Lee Stewart pays tribute to his father who coached the local football team and was an inspiration to his sons and his players. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.
results.description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Footprints on the Mountains
results.creator_credit: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: At age 11 Denise Mack is told secretly by her mother that her heritage isn’t Irish, that her grandfather was Lebanese and her grandmother, Chinese. Through this story, Denise journeys along the path of her ancestry to bring her closer to herself.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: At age 11 Denise Mack is told secretly by her mother that her heritage isn’t Irish, that her grandfather was Lebanese and her grandmother, Chinese. Through this story, Denise journeys along the path of her ancestry to bring her closer to herself.

results.title: Jidi
results.creator_credit: Stephen Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Hyper-Ballad
results.creator_credit: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.
description_for_label: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.

results.title: Hello Darling
results.creator_credit: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Mike Helal left Lebanon at the height of the war and migrated to Melbourne. Reluctant to leave, Mike started to see the beauty of his new home. Despite this, nothing deters him as he waits to be reunited with his loved one again.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Mike Helal left Lebanon at the height of the war and migrated to Melbourne. Reluctant to leave, Mike started to see the beauty of his new home. Despite this, nothing deters him as he waits to be reunited with his loved one again.

results.title: Waterholes : our turn
results.creator_credit: Kaye Munroe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kaye Munroe remembers the day the devastating Gippsland bushfires came to her doorstep. The ‘travelling fingers’ of the bushfire threatened not only her home but the beauty of the area she loved. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kaye Munroe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Kaye Munroe remembers the day the devastating Gippsland bushfires came to her doorstep. The ‘travelling fingers’ of the bushfire threatened not only her home but the beauty of the area she loved. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.

The ‘travelling fingers’ of the bushfire threatened not only her home but the beauty of the area she loved. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
